Docs.summary: Specifies how to trim characters from a string that does not completely fit into a layout shape.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Trimming%2A> property and how to use the StringTrimming enumeration. This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form. Paste this code into a form and call the ShowStringTrimming method when handling the form's `Paint` event, passing e as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
